2-spin Werner states measured only in the xy plane

Measurement rule: Spherical harmonics up to degree D=5 w/ z=0
Different hyper parameters depending on the visibility:
visibility ranges: v<=0.69 or v>=0.73 / 0.70 <= v <= 0.72
N_hidden = 2^14
N_measures = 2^10
N_measures_test = 2^14
N_steps = 2e5 / 5e6 + N_steps_ft
N_steps_ft = 1e3
learning_rate = 2e-5 * N_hidden
